Module Simulator
Package kin.render.renderobj

Class RenderObj

java.lang.Object
kin.render.renderobj.RenderObj
Direct Known Subclasses:
Beam, BottomGrid, PlainPoly, RenderShaddowObj, Sphere
public abstract class RenderObj
extends java.lang.Object
An (abstract) object that can be rendered in 3D.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int FLAGS_ALL
    Render everything special.
    static int FLAGS_FULLSPEED_SERVO
    Render, with a different color if a servo is moving nearly at full speed.

    Render, with a different color if a servo is moving.
    static int FLAGS_NONE
    Render nothing special.

    Render, with a small radii for segments, servos and touchpoints.

    Render trigger areas

    Does this object produce a mirror.

    Rendering priority: an object
    static int RENDER_PRIO_SHADDOW
    Rendering priority: shaddow
    double viewDistance
    Average distance to the projection plane in viewing direction.

    • getRenderPriority

      public int getRenderPriority()
      Return the general order of painting.
      Returns:
      render priority see constants

    • is2Doutside

      public abstract boolean is2Doutside​(int fromX, int fromY, int toX, int toY)
      Generally check, if this object is to be painted on screen.
      Parameters:
      fromX - bounding rect to paint (from x)
      fromY - bounding rect to paint (from y)
      toX - bounding rect to paint (to x)
      toY - bounding rect to paint (to y)
      Returns:
      true if outside the rect

    • is2Doutside

      public boolean is2Doutside​(int fromX, int fromY, int toX, int toY, double[][] poly2D)
      Generally check, if a given polygon (2D) is to be painted on screen.
      Parameters:
      fromX - bounding rect to paint (from x)
      fromY - bounding rect to paint (from y)
      toX - bounding rect to paint (to x)
      toY - bounding rect to paint (to y)
      poly2D - the polygon (2D)
      Returns:
      true if outside the rect

    • getShaddow

      public abstract RenderShaddowObj getShaddow​(double dx, double dy, double shaddowPlane)
      Get the shaddow object to this object.
      Parameters:
      dx - parallel light direction (x) in cm per cm height
      dy - parallel light direction (y) in cm per cm height
      shaddowPlane - height of the botton on which the shaddow appears
      Returns:
      shaddow object or null, if the object does not have a shaddow

    • getMirror

      public RenderObj getMirror​(double mirrorPlane)
      Get the mirror object to this object.
      Parameters:
      mirrorPlane - height of the botton that mirrors
      Returns:
      mirror object or null, if the object does not have a mirror

    • addShaddow

      public static void addShaddow​(java.util.ArrayList<RenderObj> scene, double dx, double dy, double shaddowPlane)
      Add all shaddow objects to a given list of rendering objects.
      Parameters:
      scene - given list of rendering objects
      dx - parallel light direction (x) in cm per cm height
      dy - parallel light direction (y) in cm per cm height
      shaddowPlane - height of the botton on which the shaddow appears

    • addMirror

      public static void addMirror​(java.util.ArrayList<RenderObj> scene, double mirrorPlane)
      Add all mirror objects to a given list of rendering objects.
      Parameters:
      scene - given list of rendering objects
      mirrorPlane - height of the botton that mirrors

    • recursivelyAddScene

      public static void recursivelyAddScene​(java.util.ArrayList<RenderObj> scene, Component component, int flags, java.awt.Color bodyColor)
      Recursively add this component and all attached components to a scene list for 3D rendering.
      Parameters:
      scene - the 3D scene to render
      component - component and its attached components to render
      flags - render flags, see FLAGS_... constants
      bodyColor - body color

    • addEnvironment

      public static void addEnvironment​(java.util.ArrayList<RenderObj> scene, Environment environment, long currentTime, int flags)
      Add all environment objects to a scene to render.
      Parameters:
      scene - list of renderable objects
      environment - the environment
      currentTime - current time in ms
      flags - render flags, see FLAGS_... constants

    • addDebugPos

      public static void addDebugPos​(java.util.ArrayList<RenderObj> scene, double[] debugPos)
      Add a debug position to a scene to render.
      Parameters:
      scene - list of renderable objects
      debugPos - array of four with position to render a debug position and radius

    • addDebugVec

      public static void addDebugVec​(java.util.ArrayList<RenderObj> scene, double[] debugVec)
      Add a debug vector to a scene to render.
      Parameters:
      scene - list of renderable objects
      debugVec - array of 6 with from...to
